channel.title: Ronald Aylmer Fisher on Andrey Akinshin
channel.description: Recent content in Ronald Aylmer Fisher on Andrey Akinshin

item.title: Convenient p=0.05
item.description: The value for which P = 0.05, or 1 in 20, is 1'96 or nearly 2; it is convenient to take this point as a limit in judging whether a deviation is to be considered significant or not. Deviations exceeding twice the standard deviation are thus formally regarded as significant.

item.title: Statistical methods for research workers
item.description: Reference Ronald Aylmer Fisher “Statistical methods for research workers” (1950) // Publisher: Springer.
